title: H2O Intense Strengthening Night-Time Treatment Unisex by Mizani, 5 Ounce
description: Concentrated overnight creme moisturizes and conditions with patented anti-breakage technology that helps dramatically improve the strength of your hair while you sleep.

title: MOROCCANOIL Gold Glimmer Shine 3.4oz
description: Moroccanoil glimmer shine is a finishing spray that attracts and reflects light to give hair a gorgeous gloss. Infused with argan oil, vitamins and antioxidants, it creates an invisible veil of luminous shine and protects hair against environmental elements such as sun, salt water and chlorine. Glimmer shine can also be used to enhance color and highlights, adding the perfect touch to any style.

title: Mizani Oil Hair Treatment, Supreme, 4.1 Ounce
description: 4.1 ounce treatment. Supreme oil hair treatment was launched by the design house of mizani. It is recommended for daily use. Please store in a cool dry place. Supreme oil hair treatment by mizani for unisex, 4.1 ounce treatment.
